page.title: 03CRAIGLUSCAR RECREATION
page.content: THE CRAIGLUSCAR RESERVOIRS ARE NOT ONLY USED FOR WATER,THEY ALSO HAVE A RECREATIONAL PURPOSE.ANGLERS FROM ALL AROUND COME TO FLY FISH THESE THREE RESERVOIRS FOR TROUT. ALL THREE ARE WELL STOCKED EVERY 2 WEEKS WITH RAINBOW TROUT. THE BIGGEST FISH CAUGHT IN 1985 WAS 4lb 12oz WHICH IS DOWN ON THE 1984 RECORD OF 7lbs 9oz. LAST SEASON Â£4500 WAS SPENT ON STOCKING THE RESERVOIRS. THE THREE RESERVOIRS WHICH MAKE UP CRAIGLUSCAR COVER A TOTAL AREA OF 40 ACRES.CRAIGLUSCAR RESERVOIRS ARE MAINLY USED BY D.A.A.C (DUNFERMLINE ARTISANS ANGLING CLUB)AS IT IS ONE OF THE LARGEST CLUBS IN FIFE,AND BECAUSE IT IS SO NEAR CRAIGLUSCAR RESERVOIRS.
